body_html:
@cancan101 I believe he means the "data_format" (e.g., NCHW).

I believe the concrete suggestion is:

  • Add an op that has data_format as an optional attribute, whose default is "NHWC".
  • In the op, check the data_format and do an OP_REQUIRES if the format isn't NCHW. All tests would explicitly pass in NCHW as the data_format.
body_text:
@cancan101 I believe he means the "data_format" (e.g., NCHW).
I believe the concrete suggestion is:

Add an op that has data_format as an optional attribute, whose default is "NHWC".
In the op, check the data_format and do an OP_REQUIRES if the format isn't NCHW.  All tests would explicitly pass in NCHW as the data_format.
body:
@cancan101 I believe he means the "data_format" (e.g., NCHW).

I believe the concrete suggestion is:

- Add an op that has data_format as an optional attribute, whose default is "NHWC". 
- In the op, check the data_format and do an OP_REQUIRES if the format isn't NCHW.  All tests would explicitly pass in NCHW as the data_format.
